comments: Honestly, the tests and papers are straight-forward (thank god) try to get him to look over your paper a week in advance. He can be a bit rude sometimes; I just try to catch him on his good days. Attend each class, you\'ll miss a lot! And take good notes. He allows you to record him, so do that as well. It will help for papers.
All lecture and has writing essays on the test. Very good at explaining but you need to go to class.

Lectures aren\'t very clear. Doesn\'t post anything online like notes,or study guides Only a mimdterm,final,& research paper.This class was hard for me because there is so much info on the test since there are only two, and he doesn\'t go over at all what you need to know for them. He doesn\'t give you choices for the essay on exam either.
